objects.text:
• Premium Genuine Leather Construction
• Artistic Hand-Drawn Patterns
• Ergonomic Rubber Sole For Comfort
• Folk-Art Inspired Design Elements

product_details.name: Bohemian Spirit Comfort Sneakers - Handcrafted Artistic Leather Shoes
product_details.description:
• ✨ Unique artistic design with intricate hand-drawn patterns and decorative details
• 🛠️ Premium genuine leather construction for durability and style
• 🌟 Distinctive tan and cream color combination with decorative stitching
• 👣 Ergonomic rubber sole with bubble texture for enhanced comfort and grip
• 🎨 Folk-art inspired scalloped edges and ornamental detailing
• 🔄 Traditional lace-up design with rust-colored laces for secure fit
• 💨 Breathable interior with light padding for all-day comfort
• 🎯 Perfect blend of casual style and artistic expression
• ✅ Handcrafted quality ensures each pair is uniquely special
• 💫 Versatile design suitable for both casual and bohemian fashion styles

banner_details:
The banner features a stylish and earthy theme that showcases a handcrafted leather shoe as the central product image (`product_image`). The background employs a layered geometric composition (`background`) where warm earth tones provide structure and interest, including large abstract shapes and a wave-like color division. The top section contains a bold headline (`heading_1`, `heading_2`) emphasizing the spirit of artisanal craftsmanship. Supporting subtext (`subheading`, `description`) communicates product features. A promotional offer is highlighted in large, bold text (`tagline_1`, `tagline_2`), followed by pricing (`price`) and a strong call-to-action button (`cta`, `cta_button_background`). The banner combines retro fonts and organic color tones for a modern bohemian aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Cream: `#F6EDE4`
- Deep Brown: `#8B5A2B`
- Terracotta Orange: `#C4703A`
- Tan Beige: `#D2B48C`
- Pale Gold: `#F9E5B7`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Warm Shadow Brown: `#5D4037`
product_color: The product image features a warm, earthy color palette, ideal for crafting a cozy and creative advertisement banner. Dominant colors include terracotta orange (#C65A1F) used in the laces and sole accents, creamy beige (#F3D6AA) covering most of the upper body, and toasted tan (#EAB96B) that blends into the midsole and heel. Subtle hints of light ivory (#FAF0E6) outline the design, while deeper clay brown (#A84E1C) adds contrast at the worn parts and edges. These colors are harmoniously blended, with smooth transitions highlighting design elements. This combination evokes a handcrafted feel, rooted in warmth and artisanal flair.
